function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of access to nutrition and basic services due to COVID-19 mitigation strategies","Impact":"Exacerbation of maternal and child undernutrition leading to ill health and chronic undernutrition in children","Mitigation":"Implementing financial-incentive based models and social-protection schemes to support vulnerable families","Technologies":"Data management systems for effective targeting of resources","People":"Marginalized and vulnerable populations","Owner":"Government and policymakers"}]}
